title: Very Comfortable Shoes
review: I bought each of my daughters a pair of these for Christmas. I was sure about them when I ordered them, I didn't know if they would like them, they are in their early 20's. When I received them I tried them on and fell in love with them. I told my girls if they didn't like them that I would keep them and get them something else. They absolutely loved them. They are very comfortable and warm, they have a thick enough bottom that you can wear them as a regular shoe or slippers in the house. My feet get too hot with regular lined Crocs so these are perfect for me being open toe. So if course I bought myself a pair. Don't be thrown off by the looks, they are very comfortable and come in a ton of different colors.

prod_name: Crocs Unisex-Adult Classic Cozzzy Fuzzy Sandals Slide
title: Cozy Comfort and Style
review: I recently gifted my mother-in-law the Crocs Unisex-Adult Classic Cozzzy Platform Sandals, and they have quickly become her go-to footwear during the winter season. She absolutely loves them and wears them every day, praising their exceptional comfort and warmth. These sandals have proven to be a great purchase that she truly adores.One of the standout features of these sandals is their ability to keep her feet nice and warm. The Cozzzy lining provides a cozy and snug feel, making them perfect for chilly winter days. Despite their open-toe design, the soft and plush material keeps her feet comfortably insulated, allowing her to wear them for extended periods without any discomfort.In addition to their remarkable comfort, these Crocs sandals also offer a more stylish look compared to the original Croc shoes. They feature a platform design that adds a fashionable touch, making them versatile enough to be worn with various outfits. Whether she's running errands or spending a casual day out, these sandals effortlessly blend comfort and style.Overall, the Crocs Unisex-Adult Classic Cozzzy Platform Sandals have been a resounding success. They have become my mother-in-law's favorite winter footwear choice, providing the perfect combination of warmth and comfort. Not only do they keep her feet cozy, but their stylish design adds a trendy element to her everyday outfits. This purchase has been truly loved and highly recommended for anyone seeking a cozy and stylish option for winter footwear.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 June 2023

prod_name: Crocs Unisex-Adult Classic Cozzzy Fuzzy Sandals Slide
title: Comfy
review: I injured my heel on a hike, but these have a broad, slightly platformed base with enough cushion and flex that I can walk and stand more comfortably, without pain, in them.This biack/white marble look has 90s appeal and they’re very practical. Really cute with jeans, simple slip dresses, pajamas and casual or sports wear. The price is fair. I might get some coordinating jibbitz for fun - or another pair.Reviewers and Crocs suggested I size up - I even measured my feet per their site instructions. My normal size is 10, every indicator said 10 - but these in 10 are a bit roomy for me.- so if I wear thin socks, they’ll be about right. The liner is comfy in reducing rub, but I think the sandal will last longer than the liner.I’m probably a 9 or would be a 9.5 if they made half sizes. My feet have high arches and they’re regular - just slightly narrow in width.They don’t slide on hardwood or linoleum, so the bottom tread is impressive.Super easy to get in and out of.This pair I received is well made, no frayed threads or or irregularities.I like how they’re warm but breathable.I’m expecting to wash them in mild dish liquid and warm water then towel and air dry before combing the liner when they’re dirty. Eventually I might remove the liner (though I would miss it).If I didn’t have high arches, were senior, living in a wet climate, recovering from an injury or worked in one of the fatiguing foot industries from travel to healthcare to kitchens - I’d consider Crocs. My foot injury has given me a serious appreciation for them. I just wish they had arch support so I could wear them more. They’re a recovery, in and around the house slipper right now.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 18 July 2023

title: Wide feet, don’t size down
review: I followed the suggestion to size down and got 1 size down from my regular, but I have wide feet and they were a bit tight. The length was right, but they are tight enough to be annoying. A bit sad, but I want to keep these sandals because they are otherwise comfy and cool as hell.Edit: I’ve worn them a couple weeks now and they are straining my big toe but I’m hoping that is the size being too small, my regular size is in stock and I’m hoping the fit is perfect. As of now, they are too tight for my foot to stay in the right place so walking outside is uncomfortable. They do squeak a lot and make my feet sweaty but I do prefer wearing socks most of the time anyway. But the size down has really caused problems.

prod_name: Crocs Unisex Adult Mellow Recovery Slide
title: Squishier "self-care" sole- stylish
review: The sole has less support than the classic comfort line, but not completely without support. They are as advertised- best as post workout shoes. I'll keep looking for an everyday shoe but these are amazing after long hours in work boots. Look great.Size: sized down 8w to 7w. I wish they had half sizes as band stretches with use.Fit: nothing digs, cuts, or rubs badly. Band hits top of foot just right. Toes framed well. I'm a narrow foot and wish it was a bit tighter but it isn't falling off by any means.Style: lovely and nonchalant vibes dress up or down easily. Color is great- pigmented but neutral enough to be versatile.Seriously I love these!!Typically wear 7.5-8, narrow foot, high arch
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 November 2023

prod_name: Crocs Unisex Adult Mellow Recovery Slide
title: If not perfect, give it time
review: The soles of these really are more comfortable than traditional Crocs (which are already comfy). These definitely feel like an end of the day slide. The top is pretty large and thick, so it takes a bit of time for it to conform to your feet, but it is starting to shape nicely. A benefit of the width of the top is that it does provide great support. I would absolutely love in these if the top sat back from the toes just a bit more to allow additional wiggle room. As I said, they do break in, I would just really like that area to not taper so much.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 4 August 2023

Sizing is okay/accurate.But the upper band (or whatever you call the part that goes over the sides and top of your foot) is too thick, too wide, too hot. Literally made my feet sweat alot!!! Which then makes you foot slide around in the shoe. If they ever come up with a thong/flip-flop style I would try them. But for now I'll have stick with my more expensive Oofos.

prod_name: Crocs Unisex Classic Sandal
title: Sounds Good
review: My usual size is 48 Merrell/Columbia or 49 Ecco/Adidas. I had to pick up size 51. I knew I had to pick up such size because of a previous experience. Once I bought 48/49 croocks sandals but it was way too tight back then. I think when it comes to sandals, one should by conventiom take one size beyond his usual shoe size. The slides size sticker tag actually showed 50/51. And on the sole its molded 15. I have wide feet. And it perfectly fits my foot width. It's a bit too long of 1cm/1,5 cm in the back and front of my foot but I will overcome the prejudice. Unless it's inherent to any pair of sandals. Pretty sure If I ever purchased 49/50 it wouldn't have been a good fit: probably would have been too tight. The crocs logo is actually attached with a sort of a clips. I removed both of them in a second and throw them away. So here we are now with a pair of Sandals with no label for 224 kr.
date: Reviewed in France on 19 February 2024

prod_name: Crocs Unisex Classic Sandal
title: Great sandal - amazing sale price
review: I originally purchased the clog style crocs, but I get rubbing on my toes and I pronate so hard on the outside of my feet that they just weren’t going to work for me. These are a great alternative for my sore feet and a nice break to wear indoors from my regular orthotic sandals. I have Morton’s Neuroma on my left food and these don’t seem to agitate it at all. They aren’t the best for long use, but give my feet a break from super stiff soles. For a regular foot, they would be good too. The straps are a bit loose on my wide feet, but they aren’t uncomfortable or unstable. Nice sandal. Super happy with this style.
date: Reviewed in Sweden on 7 July 2023

title: Surprisingly comfortable size US 7
review: Ordered size US 7 and it fits just right. Light and comfortable. Cute and understated.  A bit pricey $40.00 it seems what should be around $20-$25. Feet felt secured and cloud like. Have yet to walk outside. Will test on a good local walk. Will update review.Update July 23 2022:Pros: Light, comfortable and cute. Cons: If your feet sweat your feet will slip/slide backwards! Yikes! First time I went walking with them  in NYC early June and my shoes was sliding forward and back of my heels was sticking out. Lol tried to grip my toes but with no strap or toe key hole I kept kicking the shoe in. Mind you I had to do alot of walking that day.😳 For me can't wear on a hot day. Cool mild temp days or sadly house slippers.😰

prod_name: Skechers Women's On-The-go 600-16259 Slide Sandal
title: Best summer shoes for comfort, ever!
review: Soooooo comfy. I have Fibromyalgia and I wear these shoes round the house/garden. They are just like walking on cushions, they support and comfort my feet. I have wide feet and the 'around the foot' bit is stretchy... so they stretch to fit but spring back to hold my feet in the shoes firmly enough. They don't slip about when you're walking and you don't have to tense your feet up to hold them on (which can be painful when you have shoes that do that to you). They aren't particularly my taste to look at but they're not horrible either. They're all right really, fairly neutral and modern enough and would go with a lot of styles.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 June 2020

prod_name: Crocs Women's Splash Slides Sandal
title: Very cute slides!
review: Cute slides in a great neutral color. I got the bone color to wear mainly to yoga classes and the sauna.Easy to clean, slip on slip off, and still look cute! I ordered a 7 and am a true 7.5. They fit perfect, if not a little big.I’ve seen some reviews mention the strap - i do notice it rubbing the top of my foot but am only wearing the shoes for a short amount of time. I wouldn’t grab these as an everyday shoe, but wearing them for an hour or so around the studio/gym is perfect.

prod_name: Crocs Women's Splash Slides Sandal
title: The front end trips me up sometimes
review: I had a different brand that was a softer leather and when I would walk on our floors, hardwood or carpet, sometimes the front would fold under and trip me up. It was so annoying. So I bought these thinking it would be a harder sole and better. Nope. Still get tripped up.When I first bought them, it rubbed against one of my pinky toes. They have since stretched out a bit.  I’ve had them now for a few weeks. And I’ll have to buy another pair. 3 stars because they seem durable. But I don’t want to be falling so🤷🏽‍♀️
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 December 2023

title: I've never liked Crocs, what made me think I would like these?
review: I never liked Crocs because they looked ugly, big and bulky and for some reason, I thought these would be different.  Turns out they are not as nice in person, big and bulky and they have an abnormally large support for the arch of the foot.  I bought these and a set of Under Armour sandals at the same time and I wish I just bought two Under Armour.  The UA sandals sit snug and are comfortable, the design is keeping in mind to grip parts of the foot so they don't flop around, these Crocs don't have any of that.  These are the sandals made for people who love to "thwap" everywhere they walk.

prod_name: Crocs Unisex-Adult Baya Ii Slides Sandal
title: Good quick shoe
review: These crocs are easy to slip on to run out and do the garbage, take the dog out, etc. Sizing is odd, and can't really advise on that. My foot is a 9.5/10 wide and my son is an 11. This shoe fits us both the same. They are a bit slippery if they get wet, both the grip of the shoe and the footbed. So I have to be careful if it is raining out. But I do have a huge positive. We have a young puppy who is chewing everything. Shoes are his favorite. He got my slip on Vans and ruined them in a very short period of time. However, he has gotten these a couple times, and there is barely any evidence he has chewed on them except for a couple of tooth piercings. So they are very durable, most definitely. We purchased a second pair shortly after this one. Would recommend.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2023

title: For a cool dad like me.

For the last several years I’ve been wearing the standard slides from adidas, UA, etc. I picked this Crocs up on sale because it is very comfortable and rubber is softer. prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Slides Sandal
title: Give these a try, you'll eventually love them!
review: These are the most comfortable sandals I have ever owned. Initially, the tiny massagers may be uncomfortable but just give it some time and you'll eventually never want to take them off. I use them as my in-the house sandals and one of my favorite moments everyday is getting off work and putting these sandals on.The other main reason I love these sandals is that your feet do not sweat in them. I do not have naturally sweaty feet but for some reason in other sandals my feet would sweat and within a week the sandals would smell awful. Not in these things, my feet breathe and they are extremely comfortable.Adidas, please don't ever stop making these!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 July 2015

I heard these have the similar if not the same cushion as Yeezys. So I mean for $55 these were a steal. Plus I light the highlight green. Gotten so many compliments, some people have told me they resemble Balenciagas shape wise. So all around good show for walking or casual purposes.Cons: Not in every case, but if you have large, wide feet like me, your foot and toes will be visibly pronounced as you can see in the photos. Other than that, nothing wrong with these.

prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Slides Sandal
title: Wusste nicht, das bei Superstars solche Größenunterschiede gibt...
review: Adidas Superstar - gerade die absoluten Lieblingsschuhe meiner Tochter!Meine Tochter hat bereits ein paar Adidas Superstar in weiß mit goldenen Streifen und die sind Ihre absoluten Lieblingsschuhe! Damit Sie noch welche zum abwechseln hat, musste noch ein zweites Paar her, und wir haben uns für diese entschieden. Da sie ja bereits welche hat, die ihr auch super passen, haben wir natürlich die gleiche Größe bestellt. Bereits nach dem Auspacken, ist uns aber direkt aufgefallen, dass diese hier kleiner und schmaler wirken. Beim Anprobieren hat sich das dann leider auch bestätigt. Ich wusste ja, dass Größen (gerade bei Adidas) unterschiedlich ausfallen können. Das es jedoch sogar beim "selben" Schuh bzw. bei der selben Serie solche Unterschiede gibt, hätte ich nicht gedacht, aber sie fallen echt völlig anders aus. Trotzdem wollte Sie sie nicht mehr hergeben, kann sie aber halt nur mit wirklich dünnen Söckchen und etwas (bei der Schnürung) weiter geöffnet tragen.
date: Reviewed in Germany on 16 January 2018

prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Slides Sandal
title: Massaging shoes are great
review: These are wonderful house slippers or just for quick trips out.  Not good for long term walking.  No arch support.The little bumps massage your feet and stimulate all kinds of pressure points.The velcro band makes adjusting to your foot or size thickness easy.I wear my pair out.  The little bumps wear down.  You can see EXACTLY where your feet place the most pressure. Need to get a new pair every year or so.  But worth it.I prefer to buy the men's version instead of women's.  It gives a wider footbed which is more comfortable.My fee are about 9.5 women's.  I buy a size 9 men's and that works best.  The women's version of this shoe was too narrow.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 December 2017

prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Slides Sandal
title: Original
review: Original 100% Muchos comentarios de que parecen falsas... No compres a vendedores exteriores.La foto corresponde, y la subo a si para que se aprecie la desproporción y pasada del embalaje. Las que se me ven puestas las enviaron dos días después que las negras y llegaron dos días antes, ya que iban en un sobre de papel... Últimamente muchos problemas con el embalaje.

prod_name: adidas Men's Adilette Aqua 3-Stripes Slides Sandal
title: Mejor de lo que esperaba.
review: Pedí estas chanclas por 13€, pero al leer algunas críticas negativas, me planteé cancelar el pedido. Menos mal que no lo hice.La conclusión a la que llego es que cada vez hay más gente a la que le gusta el drama.- Es cierto que la talla es algo pequeña, pero se ahí a leer que hay que pedir 3 tallas más... Yo calzo en 45 en zapatillas Nike para running, he pedido un 46 de estas chanclas y me van perfectas.- No sé si son falsas o no, pero desde luego que si son una falsificación, están muy bien hechas. El tacto es igual al material de cualquier chancla adidas que puedas ver en cualquier tienda oficial y son muy ergonómicas y cómodas. El hecho de que vengan en bolsa y no en caja, no significa que sean falsas. Yo he comprado chanclas originales Nike y algunas vienen en bolsa.- El color este blanco y dorado es mucho más bonito cuando las tienes puestas que en las fotos.- También he leído que son iguales que las que valen 5€ en la playa... A mí me gustaría saber en qué playas venden chanclas de estas se pala a 5€, porque con ese dinero no te compras ya ni una botella de agua.- En resumen... Material de calidad, bonitas y cómodas en los pies. Por 13€ SON INSUPERABLES.
date: Reviewed in Canada on 7 September 2021

prod_name: adidas Men's Adilette Aqua 3-Stripes Slides Sandal
title: サイズに気をつけて！！履き心地はいいよ！！
review: レビューに小さいとあり、店舗で値段とサイズを確認し、Amazonで白を購入。店舗だと¥2500～¥3500ほど。なぜか¥1742だったので即決。かなり安いと思う。普段履きは27cm、購入は29.5cm。店舗で靴下を履いて28.5cmを試着。(その前後が売り場になかった為)俺みたいに靴下を履いて使う人は、+2～2.5cm大き目に買っていいと思う。写真の通り、裸足でもかかとが1cmほどあまるが、問題無くはける。履く時は絶対に裸足でっていう人は+1～1.5cmでもいいかもしれない。ただ、店舗で裸足の試着ができなかったため、それでも小さい可能性はある。履き心地は硬すぎず、柔らかすぎず、いい感じ。レビューがなかったら絶対に失敗してたので、レビューの有り難さを実感。いい買い物が出来ました。
date: Reviewed in Japan on 28 January 2024

review: Habe mir die Schlappen als Hausschuh geleistet; primär wegen der Noppen und der damit verbundenen Massage der Fußsohle. Durch den Klettverschluss lässt sich die Breite einwandfrei regulieren.Bislang bin ich mit den Schlappen vollauf zufrieden und bereue den Kauf kein bisserl.
date: Reviewed in Germany on 6 February 2024

review: My husband loves and lives these. Very comfortable, messaging, durable, and long-lasting.

prod_name: adidas

review: Los primeros usos recomiendo usarlas con calcetines ya que al principio son un poco incómodas pero una vez que te acostumbras son muy cómodas.Yo las utilizo como zapatillas de ir por casa para descargar los pies después del día de trabajo, no las recomiendo para andar grandes distancias.

review: These are always great I've been wandering about on these for three decades now and I swear by them. Buy them and try them out they are amazing.

prod_name: adidas
title: horribles!
review: Estas chanclas son una pesadilla. Chanclas de masaje? Son más bien instrumentos de tortura, por lo que son incómodos y la sensación es muy desagradable. Además, hacen tanto ruido, que resulta embarazoso. Chirrían tanto que es como si estuvieras caminando sobre una alfombra de ratones, la gente te oye a un kilómetro de distancia...
date: Reviewed in Spain on 11 October 2023

prod_name: adidas
title: Schlecht
review: Ich habe 43 groß und 43 hatte bestellt, aber 43 von Adidas ist so klein für mich. Ich habe mein cousin gefragt, ob der haben will. Der meinte ich bin's Nike fan. Ich kann diese Schuhe nicht tragen. Die Noppen der Sohle foltern das Fußbett. Man hat tatsächlich Schmerzen. Ich habe die Schuhe direkt nach der Arbeit und Duschen probiert und sie sind einfach nicht tragbar für einen weichen Fuß. Sorry, normalerweise muss man nicht warten bis der Fuß wieder hart wird bevor man einen Schuh trägt, und mit große habe auch Problem.
date: Reviewed in Germany on 26 October 2019

prod_name: adidas
title: COMODISSIME E RILASSANTI
review: Ho acquistato questa ciabatte durante il black friday e devo dire che sono veramente molto comode e grazie alle "punte" presenti su di esse permettono di avere un massaggio al piede. Molto comode e di stile, le consiglio vivamente.
date: Reviewed in Italy on 12 December 2023

prod_name: adidas
title: Like wearing a foot massage
review: Foot massage while wearing these beauties 😍

prod_name: adidas
title: Super Badeschuhe
review: Hatte mir diese Badeschuhe bestellt, da meine eigenen kaputt gegangen sind.Habe bei Adidas sonst 41 1/3. Durch die Beschreibung wurde mir empfohlen, dass ich ein wenig größer nehmen sollte so dass ich 42 gewählt habe. Diese passen mir einwandfrei. Anfangs ungewohnt sind die Noppen. Qualitativ sind die Badeschuhe sehr wertig und sehr pflegeleicht.  Das Design sieht auch gut aus.
date: Reviewed in Germany on 28 May 2018

prod_name: adidas
title: Zu empfehlen
review: Prima zu empfehlen.

prod_name: adidas
title: Einfach Adidas
review: Nachdem mir die letzten Badeschuhe geklaut wurden, brauchte ich wieder welche für die Sauna. Als ich diese hier für unter 20€ fand, war die Entscheidung nicht schwer. An die Noppeninnensohle hatte ich mich sehr schnell gewöhnt und möchte ich nicht mehr missen. Zum einen hat man beim laufen gleichzeitig eine leichte Massage der Fußsohle, zum anderen steht man mit dem Fuß nicht in einer Pfütze, wodurch man auch nicht so leicht heraus rutscht. Von mir eine klare Kaufempfehlung
date: Reviewed in Germany on 7 January 2024

title: Great sliders
review: Lasted me 3 years and still going.

review: Ich habe normalerweise eine Schuhgröße von 46/47 und habe mir den Schuh extra in der größe 50+ bestellt und ich liebe es !!! Ultra bequem !!! Nun kann ich ganz lässig reinschlüpfen und mein Fuß hat nach vorn wie nach hinten noch sehr viel Auflagefläche so das ich die extra großen Latschen "spielerisch" nutzen kann ... Ich liebe es

prod_name: adidas
title: Comode e ben fatte
review: In perfetto stile adidas le ciabatte sono comode e ci si fa l'abitudine presto al plantare "borchiato" che trovo piacevole. La taglia è esattamente quella delle vostre Nike quindi se siete una 42 prendete una 42. Consigliate.Consegna perfetta come sempre da parte di amazon

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Two years and going strong!
review: I absolutely love these sandals! I got my pair about two years ago, and they are so comfortable and lightweight! They don't seem to get dirty easily, but if they do, a quick wipe down and they're back to looking new. I have worn mine on several vacations, to the beach, everywhere and no blisters or concerns. I recently went to the outlets and these are a few dollars less than what I saw. Great, classic sandal. I would definitely purchase again!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 April 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: I am an amputee and love these sandals
review: I bought these sandals on a whim.....I am a below the knee amputee and have avoided sandals and slides since my amputation in November 2017.....I decided to purchase these because of the heel strap and figured if they did not work for me I would give them to my mother....I received them Friday afternoon and wore them around the house for a few hours and had no issues....Saturday I wore them all day including driving an hour to visit my mother and an hour back home plus around the house for the rest of the day and had no issues....can’t wait to wear them a lot over the summer and being able to wear sandals again....would totally recommend these
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 May 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Awesome So Far...... ;-)
review: I think these are cute. I love "anything" adidas actually. After reading the reviews prior to purchasing these, I thought most were saying that these shoes are wide and not true to size, meaning that they run really BIG. It was suggested to go down a size when ordering. I went back and forward with this idea for quit some time before ordering (thinking if I get them to small it would be a hassle to return). In summary, I wear a size 8 and I ordered "A Size 8" and these fit PERFECTLY. They are made to fit wide, though! I have yet to actually wear them as our weather here in MI is just getting to that point. I hope that they don't rub/hurt my feet when  I wear them. Also, I won't be sure of how durable they are until I wear them. But for now.....These are true to size and VERY comfortable.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 May 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Great sandals
review: This sandals is so comfortable and lightweight. You have to size down cause its male sizing. But overall it's a win.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 March 2023

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: YOU NEED THESE!! 😍
review: YAWL do yourself a favor and get these shoes. YOU NEED THEM. I’m normally a size 7.5 and read the reviews and got a 7 because a lot of people were saying they run big. When I first opened the box and looked at the shoes, I thought they looked kind of small and narrow. I was worried they weren’t going to fit and was thinking to myself, “the one time I listen to the reviews...”. Well, when I tried them on, they fit perfect!!! I do have a wide foot but even though the shoes looked narrow, they fit just fine. Not too snug but even if they were, they’ll still stretch out. I almost don’t wanna wear these because they’re too cute to get dirty lol I’m so glad I got these!!!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 October 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Obsessed
review: I have had two pairs in the past two years! I will wear these any day. Everyday. Lol
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 March 2023

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Wide feet.
review: I love these sandals. I have wide feet and wear a size 8. I've had the Nike tajun sandals and they were always too tight plus the colors that these come in or so cute and there's a lot of varieties I have four pairs and I just bought the last pair of signal pink and black in a size 8 I'm so glad I did cuz I've been waiting for them for months. I have one more pair coming, I recommend to everybody to buy. The only downside I come across is cleaning the sandals that are not black other than that they're great!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 May 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Comfortable
review: I purchased these slides because I needed some slides that had a back strap because I had a broken toe and wearing closed toe shoes was uncomfortable. I purchased a 7 after reading the reviews, I usually wear a 7/12. Idid find them a bit wide but it was fine for me because I was wearing socks to hide my bruised and broken toe.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 June 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Problems with your feet. These light weight shoes might be your answer.
review: Due to neuropathy in my feet, I have a difficult time finding shoes, other than tennis shoes, that are comfortable and safe to wear. These are great to wear to the beach because they are so easy to take on and off with the Velcro strap.  I purchased a second pair in case I can’t find them next year. LOVE THESE SHOES!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 May 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Not as wide as people say.
review: These definitely do not run large- they're very true to size, however they're not as wide as people say. I have thin ankles but really wide feet and they're not quite wide enough for my liking. Maybe people like that they can fit a larger ankle? I also don't love the material- it can easily make your feet sweat. I normally rave about almost any adidas product, but these aren't my favorite. I do think they're very cute though!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 March 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Very comfortable and lightweight.
review: I absolutely love these sandals. They are very comfortable and very lightweight. They fit loose but not loose to where they are falling off your feet or where they will fall off your feet, i have narrow feet and they fit fine even though they seem to be for folk who have wide feet. I ordered my normal size of 7 and it fits perfect not one issue or too big or too small. I have high arches so flat shoes tend to cause me some issues sometimes but these give me support.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Def made for wider feet
review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
        
    
    
 Loved them! Super authentic &I went with my normal size in women’s 7. People in the reviews were saying to go down a size of you have narrow feet well I do believe that’s true. The sandal is def made for ppl with wider feet but it didn’t make a difference in the sizing for me it still fit well & my toes were t hanging out in the front & neither was the back so I had no problem. My net purchase will be a 6 just to see if it makes a slight difference. I don’t think it matters tho
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 September 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Buy them!!!
review: So I have a trip to Disneyland and I wanted sandles to switch into that are going to be light weight and comfortable to walk around . I have gout Among other medical conditions and these are truly the softest sandals I’ve owned . I’m sure my feet won’t tire out as fast with these .
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 April 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: driver leaves everything close to the edge of my steps please put package next to house front door
review: The shoes are very they fit my wife very well and well liked the packaging was fine the type of material on the bottom of the shoe could be softer rubber this material that's on there is plastic and slides easily on the floor but still usable thank you very much the drivers need to go 1 step further and put the packages next to the house in a container or in back of a pillar so it can be seen easily by passerbys thank you
date: Reviewed in the United States on 1 July 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Comfortable, stylish but wide
review: These are nice and comfy. They are cheaper than the Nike tanjun sandals but don’t fit as snug. I have a narrow foot so they are a bit wide on me compared to most sandals. I like the look of them. I also enjoy that they make my feet look shorter than they really are. I don’t feel like I can job in them, or do other sporty type activities in these due to their width and looseness like I can with my nikes , but I do still like their style and comfort.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 August 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Perfect fit
review: Per reviews I was iffy about getting my go to size 7. I am size 7.5 in pointed boots or heels. Per some reviews it recommended even up to 2 sizes smaller but being that I am in between 7 to 7.5 I took chances on the 7 and they fit perfect.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 May 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Cute and comfy
review: Needed something comfy and cute for walking around on a trip to Puerto Rico. These were so comfortable and held up nicely to walking on cobblestone streets, on the beach, and through a rather muddy yard at the air bnb. The sand and dirt didn't even stain the white! I'm an 8.5 and ordered both an 8 and 9. The 8 was pushing it a little length wise. My heel was right at the end. The 9 was way too big. I kept the 8. Wish they had half sizes but overall very satisfied with these sandals.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 January 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Most comfy slide ever!
review: I'm not usually a "slide" person, but these are the cutest and most comfortable slide I've ever had! I loved them so much, I sent a pair to each of my daughters! They wear well, rain or shine, and look great! This one's a winner!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 June 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: These are the best !
review: I ordered these in black for my 12 yr old son who is special needs because he can’t wear regular slides. I just have to say Thank You Adidas for making a shoe/sandal that’s durable and easy for my son to wear and keep on during the Summer or hot days. These are perfect for him ! …or anyone looking for a comfortable and sporty sandal! 👍
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 August 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Love Them!
review: Comfortable! Just don’t put lotion or oil on the bottom of your feet. Your feet will slide! But that goes away after the cream dries! And  not so wide foot friendly but once you wear them all day. Next wear they will be comfy! Got too many compliments last Saturday 3/21 at our 5 year old birthday party!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 March 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Super adorable and comfortable!!
review: I’m so happy that I received these sandals. They are so adorable and comfy to wear. The only thing bad about it is that if you sweat from your feet. It’ll feel weird and slippery. But I’m so okay with that. I will say that I had ordered a size 7 but when I saw the shoe box. It was a size 6. I’m just surprised they still fit. They literally fit me perfectly and I’m kinda shocked. I have a feeling if I would of actually gotten the size 7, it would be big. So I am happy with this little accident. 😍
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 August 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Great support and light weight
review: I was searching for the perfect cute sandals for a theme park trip and came about these cute Adidas sandals. Upon reading the reviews I was ecstatic to see that most people mentioned it is light weight and an individual can walk for hours in the sandals.I purchased and tried them on and they are like butter do you hear me! I love love love these sandals.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 10 July 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Very cute
review: I love these sandals, I’ve gotten numerous compliments so I ordered two more pair
date: Reviewed in the United States on 16 December 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: 10 for comfort
review: Let my start off by saying that they are very comfortable. They do look a little cheap for what the cost is. Super easy to clean. Dry quickly. I would buy your regular size, unless you’re a half size. Ex. If you are 7.5, 7 would be a good fit. I’m an 8 and decided to get a 7. They fit perfect with NO room. I would rather some wiggle room. It’s about preference I guess. Overall, comfortable shoe and go with your size.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 June 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Order a size up
review: My daughter absolutely loved them until she tried them on. I ordered a half size up thinking they would fit according to the reviews. You will definitely need to go up a full size, if you want extra room try a full size and a half. Had to return them for a credit to my account due to the needed size being unavailable. Will definitely order these again in multiple colors if her size becomes available.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 July 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Size down
review: Highly recommend these shoes!!! I’ve been looking for a pair of sandals that’s lightweight, but also super comfortable & supportive, & these are all of the above. They’re super affordable & I’m getting one in every color lol. I do recommend sizing down though, all of the reviews are right. I’m usually a size 9 but ordered a size 8 in these & they fit perfectly. Will order again!!!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Comfortable
review: Love these, one of the best part of my trip to the Caribbean. So comfortable, use as water shoes also. I will definitely buy for my two girls and another for myself. I wanted to wear it everyday. Best $20 I’ve spent in a long time.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Run big!
review: Love the sandals! However there are a few white scuffs on the straps. Oh well. I am happy that I ordered a 7 and an 8 though. I wear a size 8 in nike athletic shoes but saw many reviews saying the sandals run big which they do. Left foot shows the size 7 and right foot shows size 8. 7 fits perfect. 8 was really big. Overall I recommend sizing down.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: No half sizing
review: These sandals are super cute and comfortable.  I unfortunately Had to return them.  I am a true 9.5 women’s shoe.  A 9 would be too small so I ordered the 10.  There is a tool break and it did not sit well with my feet as the were too large.  The sole was very soft and the straps were squishy.  If they came in half sizes I would have kept them.  Cute trend sandal.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 April 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Be Careful of Sizing
review: I read other reviews and I originally got my normal size (9) but that was way too small. I have long, narrow feet, so if you do too, size up! Otherwise, these are very comfy, cute shoes. I wore them while painting my house one day and they were very comfortable and clean up easily!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 September 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Absolutely Love These Shoes!!!
review: I have peripheral neuropathy, which causes my feet to be very sore. These shoes are a life-saver. First of all, they have a back strap which helps keep them on my feet since my toes are numb. (Yes, I really miss wearing my flip-flops.)Secondly, they give me arch support. They are easily cleaned. I have received many compliments on them.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 24 June 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Super Cute
review: I am happy with how light these sandals are. I don't think they run large personally. I am usually a 7.5 to 8 and per the reviews, people commented to size down. I ordered a size 7 and they are perfect as in I should probably have ordered an 8. I am keeping the 7 because they aren't too small just for those ordering, I think your normal size will be fine.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Great working sandel
review: I got these for my daughter who loves them. She goes though at least1pair a year and I'm hoping to get more than 1 season
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 May 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Love them
review: I love these sandals. I can dress them down or up. Wore them to the river and through some walking trails. They wash off very easily.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 May 2022

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Best sandals
review: The best sandals you can have while pregnant. They are very comfortable and easy to clean. I wear them everywhere, specially now that I have swollen feet and can adjust the strap. I'm usually a size 6.5 but from previous reviews, decided to go size 7. Fit alittle tight at first but will adjust after the first use.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 July 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Cute, perfect for summer/casual outfits
review: I was sold on these when I saw all the beautiful pics everyone posted. For size reference, I wear a 5.5y, 7 in women(Sneakers) and sometimes even 7.5 or 8 in sandals depending on style. I went with my gut and ordered a 7 in these and they fit perfect. They’re very comfortable and the the material with the logo is soft so it does not rub against the skin. Great purchase they look so cute on, love the contrast with the white and black. For half size I’d say order down.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 11 June 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: LOVE THESE
review: First of all , it fit perfectly!! I’m always skeptical about ordering online for this reason but these did not disappoint at all!!! Such a good price for an awesome pair of shoes. Super super cute , super comfy , I’m seriously gonna see if I can find other colors in this shoe cuz I love it so much!!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Very comfortable
review: Very lightweight and comfortable, but a little wide at the toes for my narrow foot. I wear a size 8 and ordered a size 8 which lengthwise fit. I do recommend them.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 May 2021

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Light weight, cute, very comfortable
review: These are actually my fav pair of shoes (and I have a lot of shoes). I actually bought them for camping because I needed some shoes to wear in the water where there’s a lot of rocks, but I wear them all the time now. They are super lightweight, easy to clean, and really cute! Not to mention they’re very comfortable. I feel like they are really good quality for the price! I definitely recommend
date: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2020

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Medical Shoe
review: Initially I thought they were super cute, but when I put them on the looked like a medical shoe you put in a broken foot! They are comfortable, but just look HUGE

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Cute beach sandal
review: True to size.  Cute sandal. Perfect for the beach and for travel because they are so light, easy to pack and u can get them wetI like these better than wearing slides. I feel they are more practical.  I wish adidas made these with a black footbed and sole for a monochromatic look

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Super light weight
review: These sandals are super comfy, and lightweight, they look exactly like the picture. Got so many compliments on them as well.

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: So cute, pretty comfy
review: These are so cute and comfy but they gave me a blister first time wearing :( I have wide feet. Haven’t tried them again yet. But they’re a great shoe for the price.

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Size down, walk on a cloud!
review: These feel like walking on clouds. Super light weight but comfortable and supportive. I wear a true size 8 and I ordered a 7 after reading reviews about sizing down, and they are a perfect fit. Roomy, supportive and stylish. I have been wearing these with shorts and jeans both, they’re really versatile! I might order another pair just because I love them that much. These would be perfect for wearing if you were doing a lot of waking!

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Not for flat feet but Get them anyways lol
review: Very cute i wanted these since last year and i got them to wear to six flags and GIRL ! My feet was huuuurtin sis . Bt i am also flat footed which could’ve been the main problem bt w the soles bein a little firm and flat , wasnt helpin my flat feet . But if u have normal ppl feet lol get em , i do love them . They jus not for flat footed ppl . Theyre not tight , true to size and they go w everything .

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette

review: Love them! They are cute comfortable and match with everything! Shipping was fast!

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette

review: These are so comfortable. I can wear them all day. They have a little bit of arch which makes it easy on my feet.

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette
title: Very cute

title: Big hit
review: My 10 year old wears a 4.5 in boys Nike tennis shoes and after reading reviews I was really torn on what size to get, the 4 or 5. I know these are men’s shoes so I wasn’t really sure what to expect fit wise. I ended up getting the size 5 and they are about an inch too long on him...but he wants to wear them anyways. The 4s would fit perfectly. I got them on a great sale (under $20) and they were definitely worth the price.Anyways, we got the red, white, and gray ones and the color was spot on to the photo. My son said they are super “squishy” and comfortable.We haven’t had them very long so will have to wait and see how they hold up over summer.Note: I also tried the shoe on just to see if I could get my foot into it (I wear a 7.5-8 in women’s). I could get it on But it was a little snug across the top. If i sized up To a 6 it would fit much better.

prod_name: adidas Women's Adilette Clogs Slide Sandal
title: Muy cómodas, un pisar muy blando
review: Estas zapatillas son muy cómodas, donde apoya el pie es muy blandito, de ahí la comodidad. Compré este tipo de zapatillas también de otras dos conocidas marcas, y una de ellas la tuve que devolver porque era extremadamente dura, muy incomoda, la otra me la quedé porque era aceptable su comodidad. Pero estas de Adidas han resultado ser las más cómodas con diferencia, además tras ponérmelas me da la sensación de que también absorben el sudor de la planta del pie, como si el material además de ser bastante blando, fuera algo poroso, a diferencia de otras que son tan impermeables que acumulan el sudor y la sensación no termina siendo buena. Por ahora muy contento con el producto, veremos a medio y largo plazo si no se suelta la cinta que sujeta el pie, es la única parte susceptible de fallar con el tiempo, si el producto no es de calidad, viniendo de Adidas confío en que será de calidad y no tendré problemas.
date: Reviewed in Spain on 16 May 2019

title: sehr gut gemacht aber trotzdem die größe immer falsch
review: Diese Flip-Flops sind so bequem in den Füßen, dass die untere Schicht aus sehr zufriedenstellendem Schaumstoff besteht, der bei der Pandemie den ganzen Tag hilft. Das Design ist sehr gut, ich liebe es, sehr gut verarbeitet und aus der oberen Schicht genäht Das hilft ihm, länger zu leben. Das einzige Problem, das ich mit diesen adidas Flip Flops habe, ist, dass ich bis jetzt ungefähr 6 bestellt habe und immer eine falsche Größe und egal wie groß ich sie genommen habe, immer eine falsche. Ich trage normalerweise 41,5 und ich habe 44,5 erreicht und immer noch entweder klein oder groß, weil es nicht alle Größen gibt

prod_name: adidas Originals Adilette Slip-On Slides
title: Easy to Put On and Comfortable
review: I purchased these shoes for something quick to slip on to take the dogs into the backyard. They fit well and have been very comfortable for brief use on short walks. In fact, they are even more comfortable (at least for brief use) than I had expected. They also seem easy to clean, which will be very helpful when wet and muddy outside. I have only used them for almost a month, but the shoes appear to be holding up well.

prod_name: adidas Originals Adilette Slip-On Slides
title: Comfy Sole but not with bare feet
review: Love this sandal since it has good support and brings over the ultra boost DNA to the core of the sandal leaving me with good bounce. The only thing is that I wear this sandal indoors and frequently wear them bare foot.Bare feet touching the place where you put your foot in the sandal doesn't feel the best at times. it's kind of scratchy, but if you wear socks with it then it's fine and doesn't bother me at all. Another thing is that I got the white/blue version and the white tends to leave a darker imprinting of my feet on them. It's inevitable but I just thought it would be nice to know.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 May 2022

prod_name: adidas Originals Adilette Slip-On Slides
title: Comfortable but Develop an Odor
review: These Adidas slides are not designed to get wet. They are not waterproof nor water-resistant. So definitely do not use these when getting out of the shower or around the pool.Also, these seem to develop and hold onto a foot odor over time. I take care of my feet, they are relatively clean, and I shower daily (including briefly cleaning my feet). Still, these developed a foot odor over time, even while I had only been wearing these indoors within my house.If you are looking for waterproof slides that can be used inside/outside the shower or around the pool, I instead suggest purchasing Adilette Shower Slides or Adilette Aqua Slides, both from Adidas. These are actually waterproof--the water will not soak into any of the materials.And if you are looking for comfortable slides--the ones that feel like you are walking on clouds--I suggest purchasing Adilette Comfort Slides from Adidas. These are not as waterproof as the Shower or Aqua slides, but they still seem water-resistant. More importantly, the footbed is actually very soft and comfortable. And most importantly, they don't build up and hold onto any foot odors like the Adilette Boost Slides.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 January 2024

prod_name: adidas
title: A must buy!!
review: I bought my husband yet another pair of these sandals because he wore out his last pair. I would say the last pair probably lasted a good 7 years! He has been wearing these exact sandals for longer than I have known him (16 years) and has LOVED them for so long. His foot size is 10.5 so I get him the size 11. He never has any complaints about the sandals and because we live in Arizona, with tons of dust and sand, the fact that you can just hose these off is wonderful. Great quality shoes---what shoes can you wear daily for so many years before they finally start to fall apart?!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 June 2016

title: Not comfortable
review: These are very uncomfortable and heavy. They would be good if you want to pay $50 for a pair of shower sandals. If not, don't waste your money, there are much better options out there.

prod_name: adidas
title: wearing them for years
review: I've worn the Adilette's for years. I've always been happy with the quality and comfort, and have no desire to upgrade to a newer style or try another brand. I've never been a fan of the flip flop thong between my toes so these have been the perfect solution. While I wear them 90% of the time around the house, previous pairs have always been very durable as new pairs will last 5+ years, and I expect the same from these. I wish they were less expensive but the price point is probably a testament to how well they've performed over the years.I'd highly recommend them to anybody.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 September 2016

title: These are great
review: I love adaidas slides they are the most comfortable show I practically live in them. I only gave two stars for the fact that I have been sent the same color shoe twice now. The first two pictures show what I ordered. The last picture is what I received. So I will be returning both pairs and not reordering as clearly the white with blue stripe doesn’t exist on here. So buyer be ware, if I didn’t already have navy blue I would just keep them.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 31 August 2022

prod_name: adidas
title: Not like the older versions, cut my foot!
review: I have been wearing these adidas sandals for 30 years. Over this time I've had I think 4 pairs, and usually the only reason I buy new ones is because they've been ruined by a dog or something like that. I bought these ones a while back and they were so uncomfortable and different than previous ones that I couldn't bring myself to break them in, so I fixed up my old pair and have been wearing them. I decided to finally give them another shot. I wore them around the house for a few hours and they cut the tops of my toes! All of them! I'm not talking blisters, I'm talking bleeding cuts on my skin. The underside of the sandal that goes over the foot is not at all soft like my old pairs (the material is not the same, it's thinner and more plastic-y) and the foot bed is hard also (not the cushiony foam). I feel like these are counterfeit but they were sold by Amazon so I doubt they would sell fake adidas apparel. I would definitely not recommend these sandals, sorry to say but these are not like the ones I've known, loved, and trusted over the years. I was expecting to have to break them in a little bit, but these I can't bear to wear at all. Perhaps try another seller.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 August 2020

prod_name: adidas
title: It's not
review: I liked what I saw in the picture in the ad. I disliked the product that arrived. I used this item as an example of "bait and switch" as a review for the ad, and the product I was sent. Then I returned the item I was sent. I could mention comfort or value for money. So I am.
date: Reviewed in Canada on 14 March 2023

prod_name: adidas
title: Do Not Buy for Big Feet
review: I have size 15 men's feet. I have noticed a trend with large-sized slides and thong sandals. Sandal makers do not know how the foot scales up. By that I mean, my feet are a couple inches longer than the average male's, but my ankles, while larger, are not also a full two inches longer. So Adidas puts the strap (around) 3/4 the way up the shoe, and when the average size 10 man slides his foot in, it stops so his toes sit comfortably. The size 15 slide also puts the strap 3/4 up the shoe. However, I have more foot to slide in before it reaches my ankle. So when my foot comes to a stop in these slides, my toes hang way over. The fix to this would be not to treat larger shoe sizes as carbon copies of the average model, and to place the strap further down the shoe.Two stars because it's a good looking slide and Adidas is not the only shoemaker who makes this mistake.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 2 August 2019

prod_name: adidas
title: The BEST sandal you can own for proper foot/arch support and or for Plantar Fasciitis
review: Like my title says, "The BEST sandal you can own for proper foot/arch support and or for Plantar Fasciitis".These sandals single-handily cured/repaired my Plantar Fasciitis TWICE after injury!These are worth every cent of the cost, and more.True to size.True to width.Great value because they last forever!The best sandal you can/will ever own for proper foot support, PERIOD!
date: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2020

title: Great classic sandal

Other than that, this is a great sandal and I'm glad Addidas hasn't changed this sandal since the 70's. It's a classic!

prod_name: adidas
title: Broke in less than a week
review: When they look good to me, the quality is far below expected. First of all, they are slippery even on a dry floor. It was at the border level, and I decided to keep them. I used them for visits to the swimming pool. After a few visits (one week total) the right one broke. See the picture. Are they not waterproofed?It is possible that I received the broken one in the first place, but where is the quality control?Vlad.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 25 June 2023

I can leave them outside and slip into them as I walk out. For The Money They Are COMFORTING And Could Take Getting wet.

prod_name: adidas
title: Bringing back a classic!
review: Loved these sandals as a soccer player all throughout junior high and high school.  Randomly saw a picture the other day and wondered if they were still around.  Apparently they are a classic since they are still being made-yay!  Anyway, many of the sandals have those little prong things as part of the sole, which I find very uncomfortable.  I love that these are smooth and contoured to fit my feet.  I normally wear a women's size 8.5-9 and ordered a 7-they fit perfectly and are super comfortable. Oh, and they look cool:)
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2015

prod_name: adidas
title: If you usually wear a half size be sure to go to the size up from that.
review: I usually wear size 10.5 in shoes, I bought a size 11 in these Adilette slides and they are an exact fit. Fairly good arch support, though I am flat footed and usually prefer flat footbeds. I can see how someone with a high instep may find these too snug on the top of the foot.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 October 2016

prod_name: adidas
title: Great sandal, great price, great fit.
review: Love these sandals. Replacing another “name” sandal and I like these much better. More comfortable, better support, great fit.  Actually I am already thinking of ordering a second pair to put in the closet to make sure i always have a supply.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 30 October 2020

prod_name: adidas
title: They look the same as my old pair but they definitely don't feel the same.
review: I had another pair that I had bought in the late 90's but had to dispose of them last year when the sides of the slipper cracked.  They were by far my favorite pair of slippers because they provided me with proper arch support and I could wear them all day around the house.  However, when I bought another pair to replace the ones I got rid of, I was surprised they looked and felt different.  The material has changed and when I slipped them on, they weren't as comfy as my original pair.  Is anyone else noticing this?  These slippers feel somewhat stiff.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 April 2015

prod_name: adidas
title: Best flip-flop sandals on the market for men. Say no to thongs!
review: My favorite sandals. Bought these in high school when I was on swim team, now 10 years later I bought another pair and they were still everything I remembered, so comfortable and they feel like they form perfectly to your foot. They dry well too if you take them to the gym, just run a towel through them and they are good to throw in your gym bag.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 12 June 2017

prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Sandal
title: Tolle adiletten. Mit ein paar schwachstellen
review: Als ich die Schuhe zum ersten Mal an hatte, ist eine neue Welt für mich aufgegangen. Es tat sooooo gut.Sie sollten Hausschuhe für mich sein.Nach ein paar Tagen, wurden die Schuhe bei dauerhaftem in der Wohnung an haben aber etwas unangenehm, als wären meine Füße aufgeraut.Nach etwa zwei Wochen habe ich den Unterschied zu anderen Adiletten praktisch nicht mehr wahrgenommen.Als Hausschuh sind sie also nicht wirklich empfehlenswert, zumal sich natürlich auch gerne schmutz zwischen den Massageknubbeln anhäuft. Ich nutze sie jetzt nur noch zum Duschen oder in der Therme (wofür Badelatschen ja auch Eigene gedacht sind)Es sei dazu gesagt, dass ich eine ziemlich dicke Hornhaut am Fuß habe. Ich gehe davon aus, dass Leute mit weicheren Füßen schneller ein unangenehmes empfinden verspüren und nach einem Tag im Schwimmbad mit dann noch nassen Füßen eher unentspannt nach Hause gehen.Passen tun sie perfekt. Ich hätte aber lieber eine stabile Schlaufe als eine anpassbare, da auch die Schlaufe an der Fußoberseite manchmal kratzt.
date: Reviewed in Germany on 19 July 2023

prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Sandal
title: Great fit and adjustable
review: I like to wear flip flops at home. Then I like to wear socks in the winter as well. This becomes a problem with regular flip flops that have the toe separators and thy are very uncomfortable.These slides are the best. I wear shoes ranging from 12-14 depending on the style. These are size 14 and they fit just right - even with socks. I bought these because there is some adjustability for wide feet given the flaps in front are adjustable. I had bought fixed (non-adjustable) nike slides in size 13 and my feet wouldn't even enter the slides. So these slides are great for me.I had an adidas pair of slides in a different color combo before - the same kind as these with the accupressure nubs. The nubs wore off after a year and then couldn't find the same kind for a long time. So glad I found these on Amazon.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 15 March 2021

prod_name: adidas Unisex-Adult Adissage Sandal
title: Good shower shoes
review: I bought these to use in the pool (on deck) and the shower at the gym. It takes a while to break them in, or rather to break your feet in so that the nubs massage instead of hurting. But once your tender feet get used to them, it's smooth sailing. I've had them for 6 months, and they still look like new. I've had the black adidas slides before, and I would lose/break nubs from the area under the ball of my foot after a few months. I haven't lost a nub yet from these.

title: Bastante contento peeero...
review: Muy satisfecho con la compra.Viendo las chanclas de cerca y algunas reseñas de amazon he optado por no darles un uso de piscina/playa y os explico porqué.Lo primero son muy cómodas, la base es acolchada y parece que vas en una nube, para pasear a mi me resultan cómodas y la parte del empeine es tirando a bajita por lo que se me quedan muy bien ceñidas al pie. Siguiendo con la parte del empeine por las reseñas he acabado pensando que son susceptibles de romperse puesto que va pegado a la base de la chancla (no cosido), también la parte interna de éste empeine tiene una tela con porosidad y no es como para ir mojándolas, si no tiene pinta de que van a durar poco.Dicho ésto, estoy muy contento con ellas pero dejándolas para un uso de estar por casa o ir a dar una vuelta y poder ir con los pies al aire.

prod_name: Nike Men's Revolution 6 Nn Sneaker, Black White Iron Grey, 11.5 UK, Black White Iron Grey, 12.5 US
title: Comodidad y estilo en cada paso
review: Encontrar unas zapatillas que combinen comodidad y estilo no siempre es fácil, pero estas han sido un acierto total. Aproveché una promoción para adquirirlas, y desde el primer momento en que las usé, supe que había hecho una buena elección.Lo que más destaco es la comodidad. Ya sea para una sesión de gimnasia, una caminata larga o simplemente para el día a día, estas zapatillas ofrecen un soporte y confort excepcionales. Se adaptan perfectamente al pie, proporcionando una sensación de ligereza y suavidad con cada paso.Además, el diseño es moderno y versátil, lo que las hace adecuadas para una variedad de atuendos y ocasiones. No solo te sientes bien al usarlas, sino que también te ves bien.
date: Reviewed in Spain on 18 November 2023

title: Good shoe, but not for speed.
review: I bought this shoe for running, and it worked pretty well. The box was damaged when it arrived, but the shoe itself was in good condition. It was very comfortable as well. However, they are not a good fit if you plan on running competitively. They are relatively heavy compared to racing shoes, and they are not good for running at top speed. That being said, the shoes make good trainers/everyday shoes and are great for price.

prod_name: Nike Men's Revolution 6 Nn Sneaker, Black White Iron Grey, 11.5 UK, Black White Iron Grey, 12.5 US
title: Cheap Quality Alert: Amazon/Nike, Address This Shoe Disaster or Face Public Outcry
review: I strongly advise against wasting your hard-earned money on these shoes. I purchased the same white pair of shoes from Flipkart, and they're still in excellent shape after more than 2 years. Shockingly, I received the black version of the same shoe from Amazon, and the sole of both the left and right shoes completely tore apart within just 2 months, as evident in the attached photos. It's deeply disappointing and frustrating to see Amazon or Nike playing with our hard-earned money like it's a joke. I demand that Amazon or Nike take immediate action to rectify this situation. If my concerns are not addressed promptly, I won't hesitate to share my terrible experience on YouTube, exposing the lack of quality and customer careUPDATE AFTER 2 MONTHS:- There is NO HELP from Nike or AmazonI pwrsonally suggest nike revolution 6 is not good especially if you wanna wear in all seasons including  mansoonI am using such nike from 2014Amazon I very much disliked your service.An Executive  named Afreen said me on call "if nike dosent helps you,then Amazon will give you all refund"But later on call they said you have exceeded your timing of 10 days you are not gonna get any help from us, I also have proofs.I WASTED MY TIME AND MONEY AS WELL
date: Reviewed in India on 10 August 2023

title: Buena compra, pero están muy grandes!

Las sandalias estan muy bonitas, son antiderrapantes, buena superficie para la planta del pie - PERO - al no estar acolchado en el interior (lo que da al empeine)… la horma es muy grande para un pie ancho (mi pie es delgado), así que me queda muy flojo!Si van a comprar este tipo de sandalias, les recomiendo una medida abajo a la suya (yo debí comprar talla 29, en vez de 30). Lección aprendida!!Aun así la calidad es muy buena, y las recomiendo mucho!

prod_name: Nike Damen Victori One Slide Sandal
title: Spitze klappt um, Sohle reißt ein
review: Der Schuh ist angenehm weich, hat einen leisen Tritt und ist leicht.Soweit zu den positiven Punkten.Das schlimmste negative: die Schuhspitze klappt beim laufen um und man stolpert über den eigenen Schuh. DAS geht gar nicht. Folge dessen ist auch das einreißen der Sohle vorn an der Stelle, wo der Riemen befestigt ist, kein wunder...Beim kontakt mit Wasser saugt sich der breite Riemen mit Wasser voll und trocknet schlecht.Ich hebe den Schuh erfolgreich reklamiert. Empfehlen kann ich folgenden Nike: Nike Damen Victori One Badepantolette, die keine der genannten negativen Punkte aufweist

prod_name: Nike Unisex Everyday Cushion Ankle Training Socks (3 Pair)
title: 🌟 Nike Herren Everyday Cushion Ankle Socken - Komfort und Stil für jeden Tag! 🌟
review: Die Nike Herren Everyday Cushion Ankle Socken im 3er Pack bieten unschlagbaren Komfort und einen stilvollen Look für deinen Alltag. Egal, ob du aktiv bist oder einfach nur bequeme Socken für den täglichen Gebrauch suchst, diese Socken werden dich nicht enttäuschen.Hervorragende Dämpfung:Die Cushion-Technologie von Nike sorgt für eine hervorragende Dämpfung, die deine Füße den ganzen Tag über verwöhnt.Weiches Material:Diese Socken bestehen aus weichem und angenehmem Material, das deine Füße glücklich macht und Reibung minimiert.Ankle-Schnitt:Der Ankle-Schnitt bietet eine ideale Balance zwischen Abdeckung und Belüftung, perfekt für jeden Tag.Atmungsaktives Design:Die Socken sind mit belüfteten Zonen ausgestattet, die für eine gute Luftzirkulation sorgen und deine Füße frisch halten.Passgenaue Größe:Mit ihrer perfekten Passform sitzen diese Socken bequem an deinen Füßen, ohne zu verrutschen.Vielseitig einsetzbar:Ob im Fitnessstudio, bei der Arbeit oder zu Hause - diese Socken sind der perfekte Begleiter für jeden Anlass.Stilvoller Nike-Logo:Das ikonische Nike-Logo auf den Socken verleiht ihnen einen sportlichen und trendigen Look.Fazit: Maximale Bequemlichkeit für deinen Alltag!:Die Nike Herren Everyday Cushion Ankle Socken sind der Inbegriff von Komfort und Stil. Mit ihrer hervorragenden Dämpfung, weichem Material und atmungsaktiven Design sind sie die perfekte Wahl für jede Aktivität. Hol dir diese Socken im praktischen 3er Pack und genieße jeden Tag den höchsten Tragekomfort! 🌟🧦👟

title: Fantastic!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
review: My son loves these & they feel super comfortable! I was concerned that they would be falling off all the time and that he would be running & falling bc of the way that they go on w.the strap. Nope. Not at all. No issues what so ever. I'll be buying these again when needed. Worth the money. My son wears these every day to play outside, go for walks, running in parks, and so on...they still look completely new. I'll be passing these down to his younger brother once foot sizes change. Thanks for the awesome product!

prod_name: Nike Kawa Slide Se (TD), Unisex-Children and Youth Sneakers

He finally outgrew them this summer so I bought another pair. So easy to slide on, and they don’t slip off easily either. Material has held up well (my toddler is a nonstop kinda kid) perfect for wet or dry weather conditions, easy to wash off dirt or mud. Plus they look cool 😎

I did buy a size up and gave the smaller size to my siblings.

prod_name: Under Armour Men's Locker Camo Slide Sandal
title: Sizes Run SMALL, get a size up
review: Recently purchased these as my red Nike slides popped. I already trust the under Armour brand, so I knew what to expect before I got them.BEWARE: buy a size up. I’ve attached some images here, the Red Nike Slide is a 12. The under armor slide is ALSO a 12, yet my foot doesn’t even FIT in the 12 from UA. I ended up having to get a 13 which fit me better.If you’re reading this review, they are worth the money. Just make sure you BUY A SIZE UP, if you’re a 12 like me get a 13. Their sizes run small.Slip on, can easily rinse them off, they’re a good pair of slides OVERALL. You can wear them in the house, or outside. Throw some water on them and they’re new again. Under Armour is always a go to, good products, that will last.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 23 November 2023

title: Good

I am a UK size 13.5 wide fit so I ordered the size 14, they sent me size 15 by mistake but probably a good thing because although the extra space on top looks kinda funny the band fits on quite tight but is completely fine as I'll be using it for public showers at gyms etc. So I won't be walking long distances or anything.

title: Very odd fit
review: The length is perfect, the fit around the waist is perfect, but it is SO BAGGY everywhere else. This is a terrible fit for any exercise that involves lots of movement. I am slim, but not overly so. A standard fit person with medium build. If I wear these for tennis, I am constantly sliding the shoulders and body back into place. I can't imagine any serious exercise where this much billowing of the shirt would be beneficial. "Fitted" is a horrible description for this fit.

Everything else is the right size, but it's just baggy round the middle.Also, watch out for Sports Direct sneakiness on the postage; I was certain this was on Prime and free delivery, but I ended up getting stitched up for nearly £8 postage on an £18 item that I didn't spot until it arrived. I'd send it back but (usual SD style) I'd still end up paying the postage so would be £8 out of pocket with nothing to show for it.Wish I'd spotted it was SD when I ordered, as there are so many better and more straightforward sellers out there :-(

prod_name: Under Armour Men's Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt
title: Good workout shirt for the money
review: As someone who regularly hits the gym, I can confidently say that the Under Armour Men's Tech 2.0 Short-sleeve T-shirt is one of the better workout shirts I've owned. The material is designed to wick away sweat and moisture, keeping me cool and dry during my workouts. The fit is also perfect, providing enough room for movement without feeling too loose or tight. Overall, I highly recommend the Under Armour Men's Tech 2.0 Short-sleeve T-shirt to anyone looking for a comfortable, high-quality shirt to wear during their workouts.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 5 April 2023

prod_name: Under Armour Men's Tech Short Sleeve T-Shirt
title: I like these a lot
review: I buy these on sale and have been lucky so far.  They are far more durable and fit better than "always cheap" synthetic tees.  The stitching survives a lot of use - no loose or hanging threads so far.  They are not super breathable and not super heavy.  I wear large size in summer for air flow but medium most of the year.  They dry fast and I can easily just hang them up overnight to dry vs a dryer (this makes shirts last a LOT longer if you do that).I have a hard time paying full price for anything. They would probably be worth it at full price but sales happen and these are good, durable tees.  Get one or try one to see how it fits on you.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 December 2023

In terms of comfort compared to the popular Adidas Adilette Comfort Slides,  this Adidas still beat the Under Armour as the sole is much softer while still providing good support. Walking also feels more cushioned on the Adidas but the Under Armour sandals are much cheaper when on promo.

prod_name: Under Armour
title: Quality
review: I have bought Under Armour since they started. I am noticing a decrease in quality and duration of the product. Seams start to come apart early and the logos start to come off after a few washes. I still have some early products from over 8 years ago and they are in great shape and the logo still looks great.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 January 2024

prod_name: Under Armour
title: Distance running will cause discomfort
review: I have a ton of UA compression shorts for working out, running, surfing, you name it. I was excited to try this version at this price point. I'll tell you that I'll wear them working out - lifting, group exercises classes, CrossFit, that sort of thing. I'm also training for a marathon though and I wore them on two separate occasions for longer runs - 8 miles and 12 miles. The material these are made from are a little more rough over my other pairs of UA compression shorts. Yes they compress fine, but on longer runs they started chafing me. The first time I thought maybe it was a fluke so I gave them another shot with the same results you can feel during your shower after when hot soapy water goes to the rubbed and worn skin.In the end, I'll wear them to the gym for a workout - I'm hesitant for all day at the beach, but def a no-go for distance running.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 February 2024

prod_name: Under Armour
title: The only compression shorts that worked!
review:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    
 First time buying compression shorts for my son.All those Amazon 3-in-a-pack deals dont work. They are just underwear made to look like compression shorts. We bought different brands to try but none worked.This one is way better quality - spandex is strong, material is thicker. You can tell it’s made for its purpose. Waist band is a lot thicker than usual underwear as well.The video and picture is for XS. We kept the S size. He is 16, 5’7”, 125lbs and wears S size in pants.In comparison, the 3-packs S sizes are loose and even one of them did fit (no excess fabric), it just felt he’s wearing a long pair of underwear. We were tempted to keep that S size that fitted ($26 for 3 pairs) but glad underarmour came in the mail just in time.It should be snug and feels like tighter than wearing a scuba diving suit. You can feel it’s compression all around including the thighs.I wish the S size was on sale (XS grey in this video was $15) so we end up paying $22 for the S black color underarmour. Cost almost 3x more than the 3-packs but better one that works than 3 that does not perform.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 28 July 2023

prod_name: Under Armour Men's UA Surge 3
title: Bueno, bonito, barato. Espero que durable.
review: Son los primeros de la marca que compro, vengo de nike y en verdad camino mucho unos 7km en promedio diario. Así que unos Nike se me acaban en un año al punto de tirarse hechos polvo... quise probar esta marca por dos temas: la comodida, confirmo que son comodos más no andas en una nubecita como algunos nike pero si vamos a puntuar la comodidad diría que un 8.5 cuando unos vans o unos converse son 1. La suela si pisas mojado no tiene mucho agarre, no es que te resbales pero el agarre en piso mojado y liso es como de 4-5 para que tengan cuidado en ese tema. Creo que en relación costo beneficio son unos excelentes tenis. Creo que comprare más de la marca buscando precios más altos esperando tengan un mejor confort. Los recomiendo.
date: Reviewed in Mexico on 26 January 2024

prod_name: Under Armour Men's UA Surge 3
title: I love these
review: These shoes are versatile- good for walking or running or other kinds of sport, they’re comfortable and quite lightweight, I run in these but I’d say there are better running shoes. I’ve had in the past. Although I’d buy another pair in a different colour. Maybe the black and white or grey. They fit me well and the white colour I got looks nice. Better than any of the photos advertised really. They do stain easily but as long as you clean them straight away when you get home it’s alright. They’re quite bendy and give a sort of boost when you jump in them which is nice. Good shoes

prod_name: Under Armour Men's UA Surge 3
title: Stealthy Solemates: Black Under Armor Athletic Shoes Kick Booty
review: Hold on to your socks, folks, because these black Under Armor athletic shoes are about to knock your feet off! These bad boys are like a covert operation for your toes, delivering stealthy comfort and style that'll make you feel like a ninja on a mission to conquer the world (or at least the neighborhood basketball court).First things first, let's talk about the blackness of these shoes. They're so black, they make the night sky jealous. It's like strapping a pair of mini black holes to your feet, ready to absorb all the attention and keep your fashion game on point. Whether you're hitting the gym, going for a jog, or simply kicking back with your pals, these shoes will have you looking sleeker than James Bond in a tuxedo.Now, let's talk about comfort. These shoes are so cozy, it's like walking on a cloud that's been sprinkled with unicorn feathers. The moment you slip them on, you'll feel like your feet are being hugged by a squadron of baby kittens. It's a blissful experience that'll have you wondering why you haven't been wearing these shoes since birth.And the performance? Oh boy, get ready to unleash your inner sports superstar. With their advanced technology and built-in superpowers (okay, maybe not superpowers, but close enough), these shoes will have you jumping higher, running faster, and pivoting with the agility of a gazelle on roller skates. Your opponents won't know what hit them as you leave them in the dust, questioning their life choices.But wait, there's more! These shoes are like the secret agents of the sneaker world—they're lightweight, durable, and ready to take on any challenge. Rain, mud, or an unexpected game of leapfrog over a puddle, these shoes won't let you down. They're built to withstand the elements and keep you going strong, like a trusty sidekick that never leaves your side.In conclusion, these black Under Armor athletic shoes are the ultimate blend of style, comfort, and performance. They'll have you feeling like a ninja warrior, ready to conquer the world one stride at a time. So, strap them on, lace them up, and prepare to kick some serious booty (figuratively, of course). Embrace the power of the stealthy solemates, my friends, and let your feet experience the glory of footwear excellence.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 21 May 2023
